name: Concomitant
description:
A short game for the GMTK Jam20201

Help this scientist in his endevours to go back in time, keep in mind that the timelines are linked.

Controls:

arrows and wasd ->move 

hold space bar down-> move both characters simultaneously

press space bar ->switch between characters 

If the screen looks cut, try adjusting the in browser zoom. It gets wacky when using bigger monitors. Idk why :(

Music made on "https://www.oceanwaves.io"

Pixelart made in PixelStudio
